title: Simple Assault
description: [P.C. 1.01] Attempts to or commits an injury upon another person without the use of a weapon

title: Assault
description: [P.C. 1.02] Attempts to or commits injury upon another person while using a weapon

title: Aggravated Assault
description: [P.C. 1.03] Attempts to or commits serious or grievous bodily injury upon someone with a weapon

title: Simple Assault of an LEO
description: [PC 1.04] Simple assault that occurs upon an on duty LEO

title: Assault of a LEO
description: [PC 1.05] Simple assault that occurs upon an on duty LEO

title: Aggravated Assault of LEO
description: [PC 1.06] Aggravated Assault that occurs upon an on duty LEO

title: Simple Batter
description: [PC 1.07] Attempts to or commits a violent injury upon another person without the use of a weapon and with intent or pre-meditation

title: Battery
description: [PC 1.08] Attempts to or commits injury upon another person while using a weapon and with intent or pre-meditation.

title: Aggravated Battery
description: [PC 1.09] Attempts to or commits serious or grievous bodily injury upon someone with a weapon and with intent or pre-meditation.

title: Simple Battery of LEO
description: [PC 1.10] Simple battery that occurs upon an on duty LEO

title: Battery of LEO
description: [PC 1.11] Battery that occurs upon an on duty LEO

title: Aggravated Battery of LEO
description: [PC 1.12] Aggravated battery that occurs upon an on duty LEO

title: Attempted Murder Second Degree
description: [PC 1.13] The failed or aborted attempt to murder another person

title: Attempted Murder First Degree
description: [PC 1.14] The failed or aborted attempt to murder another person with premeditation and deliberation

title: Attempted Murder of LEO Second Degree
description: [PC 1.15] The failed or aborted attempt to murder a LEO

title: Attempted Murder of LEO First Degree
description: [PC 1.16] The failed or aborted attempt to murder a LEO with premeditation and deliberation

title: Involuntary Manslaughter
description: [PC 1.17] Recklessly or accidentally Kills another person

title: Vehicular Manslaughter
description: [PC 1.18] Recklessly or accidentally kills another person while driving a motor vehicle

title: Voluntary Manslaughter
description: [PC 1.19] Recklessly or accidentally kills another person with intent to physically hurt the person

title: Second Degree Murder
description: [PC 1.20] Kills another person with the intent to kill

title: First Degree Murder
description: [PC 1.21] Kills another person with the intent to kill with premeditation and deliberation

title: Unlawful Imprisonment
description: [PC 1.22] Restricts a person's movement within any area without justification or consent

title: Kidnapping
description: [PC 1.23] Abducts another person and holds them against their will for an extended period of time

title: Hostage Taking
description: [PC 1.24] Holds a person with a threat to their life or well being with intent or declaration of using them for leverage for escape or personal gain

title: Criminal Threats
description: [PC 1.25] Any person who willfully utters a threat to commit a crime which will result in death or bodily injury to another person

title: Reckless Endangerment
description: [PC 1.26] Disregard for one's own life or the life of another

title: Harassment
description: [PC 1.27] Unwanted, uninvited, and unwelcome contact that causes nuisance, alarm, or substantial emotional distress without any legitimate purpose

title: Torture
description: [PC 1.28] To include acts specifically intended to inflict severe physical or mental pain or suffering

title: Arson
description: [PC 2.01] Willfully and maliciously setting a fire, causing, or aiding in someone to burn a structure, forest land, or property

title: Aiding and Abetting
description: [PC 2.02] To assist someone in committing or to encourage someone to commit a crime, in a clear premeditated manner

title: Trespassing
description: [PC 2.03] Entering or remaining on someone else's property without permission or a right to do so

title: Trespassing Within A Restricted Facility
description: [PC 2.04] A person who, without proper authorization, enters any government owned or managed facility that is secured with the intent of keeping ordinary citizens out

title: Loitering
description: [PC 2.05] To be dilatory, delay, linger, saunter, or to idle, in a public area without a purpose

title: Loitering on Government Property
description: [PC 2.06] To be dilatory, delay, linger, saunter, or to idle, on Government property without a purpose

title: ATM Tampering
description: [PC 2.07] Any unauthorized modification or manipulation of an Automated Teller Machine (ATM) by an individual or group of individuals with the intention of stealing money or sensitive information

title: Electronic Tampering
description: [PC 2.08] Electronic tampering with property of another person or entity with intent to cause substantial inconvenience or gain unlawful access for monetary gain

title: Robbery
description: [PC 2.09] The direct taking of property (including money) from a person (victim) through force, threat or intimidation

title: Burglary
description: [PC 2.10] The unlawful entry of a structure to commit  theft

title: Breaking and Entering
description: [PC 2.11] The entering of a building or structure through force without authorization

title: Petty Theft
description: [PC 2.12] 5k and under

title: Grand Theft First Degree
description: [PC 2.16] 100k or more

title: Grand Theft Auto
description: [PC 2.17] To take someone else's vehicle, without permission and with the intent permanently or significantly to deprive the owner of it

title: Joyriding
description: [PC 2.18] The unlawful taking of a vehicle without the consent of the owner, without intent to permanently deprive the owner of the vehicle

title: Theft of a Government Vehicle
description: [PC 2.19] The unlawful taking of a Government vehicle

title: Carjacking
description: [PC 2.20] Taking a motor vehicle by force, violence, and/or intimidation with intent to cause death or serious bodily injury

title: Possession of Stolen Property
description: [PC 2.21] Receiving, disposing, or retaining property which was known or should known to be stolen, unless it is obtained with intent to restore it to the owner

title: Possession of Marked Money
description: [PC 2.22] Possession of money that is marked

title: Extortion
description: [PC 2.23] The use of force, or threat of force, to obtain money or another item of value from another person

title: Forgery
description: [PC 2.24] The crime of creating a false document, altering a document, or writing a false signature for the illegal benefit of the person making the forgery

title: Fraud
description: [PC 2.25] Intentional deception to secure unfair or unlawful gain, or to deprive a victim of a legal right

title: Vandalism
description: [PC 2.26] The act of intentionally defacing or damaging another person's property

title: Vandalism fo Government Property
description: [PC 2.27] The act of intentionally defacing or damaging Government property

title: Destruction of Private Property
description: [PC 2.28] The act of destroying (intentional or not) another person's property

title: Destruction of Government Property
description: [PC 2.29] The act of destroying (intentional or not) Government Property

title: Possession of Items Used in the Commission of a Crime
description: [PC 2.30] Any tool, explosive, or other device commonly used in the commission of burglary, theft, or other crime with the intent to make use thereof in the commission of a crime
